caseName: BUNCE v. VISUAL TECHNOLOGY INNOVATIONS, INC.

recap_documents.description: ORDER THAT UNDER FED. R. CIV. P. L L(B)(2) AND L L(C) THAT MR. RAJAN SHALL: PAY A $2,500.00 PENALTY TO THE CLERK OF COURT WITHIN TWENTY-ONE (21) DAYS OF THIS ORDER. COMPLETE, BY THE END OF HIS UPCOMING CLE COMPLIANCE PERIOD, A ONE-HOUR CLE CREDITED SEMINAR OR EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM ABOUT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND LEGAL ETHICS. MR. RAJAN SHALL, BY THE END OF HIS UPCOMING CLE COMPLIANCE PERIOD, SUBMIT TO THIS COURT CERTIFICATION OF HIS COMPLETION OF THE SEMINAR OR EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM. SIGNED BY DISTRICT JUDGE KAI N. SCOTT ON 2/27/25. 2/27/25 ENTERED AND COPIES E-MAILED, MAILED TO UNREPS.(bw) (Entered: 02/28/2025)
